alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 11:52AM EDT until May 12 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at Riverton. Wabash River at Terre Haute. Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. Wabash River at Covington. Wabash River at Montezuma. .Recent rainfall has lead to minor flooding along much of the Wabash River in western Indiana. Flooding is expected to conclude this coming weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Covington. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Some low agricultural fields flood. Backyard flood of cottages a short distance north of U.S. Highway 136. High water blocks land access to at least one residence. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:45 AM EDT Wednesday was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 7.1 feet Saturday, May 21. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
